column2: The location at which the crop is sown and harvested from.
The type of crop harvested which ranges from cereals and grains to garlic and maiz.
The Number of hectares of the crop that were sown. This is to test to see which areas were the most successful in producing the crop,
The number of hectares of the crop successfully harvested from the region.
Number of tonnes obtained from harvesting the crop.
The success rate of the harvesting of the desired crop.
